data.title: Liam Mower - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Liam Mower: his birthday, what he did before fame, his family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

English actor and dancer who earned substantial acclaim for his work in the title role in Billy Elliot the Musical, a role he shared with two other boys. He has since appeared in productions like Swan Lake and landed television roles like that of Mikey in the ITV series Wire in the Blood.

Before Fame

He was born in Kingston upon Hull and attended the Royal Ballet School. He also attended the Northern Theatre Company.

Trivia

He and the two other actors who portrayed Billy Elliott jointly received a Laurence Olivier Award for their performances, marking the first time the award had been shared among actors.

Family Life

He has brothers named Luke, Lewis and Leighton.

Associated With
